name: Spooky Ice Fishing Game
description:
It's a cold winter's night. The only light you have is a flashlight.

Mysterious things lurk under the frost covered lake where you must catch one legendary fish. 

However, something else is out there. 

Don't let them catch you.

There's currently issues with the resolution and it's scaling, we're going to fix that as soon as possible.

SPOOKY ICE FISHING
A Game by Team Fish

Programming: Dicle T. and Valtteri S.
Art: Aliisa V. and Hekate R.
Music: Weird - Jesús Lastra

Extra BIG THANK YOU to Pazi

(for any complaints about bugs please angrily dm Valtteri)
